Articles.Content:
My first Part finally made it into the game but i cant move it around after i placed it once in the VAB/SPH.

i also got another problem. I calculated the node positions with the KSP Node converter but only the bottom node appears.

Blender:

top face:

X:0

Y:25cm

Z:0

KSP Node Converter output:

node_stack_top = 0, 0, 25, 0, 1, 0, 1

bottom face:

X:0

Y:0

Z:0

KSP Node Converter output:

node_stack_bottom = 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 1

Edited January 22, 2015 by Nupol

OP if you did not want this thread to be closed please pm me and I will reopen it

Edited January 22, 2015 by Navy4422
